title: RLC III 1v1 Tournament Week 3! 15K RP + 100AUD PRIZE Pool

embed.description: Welcome back to Week 3 of the RLC III 1v1 League! The RLC will have players battling it out on the Howling Abyss over a period of 8 weeks for the chance to qualify for the RLC Invitational event, Risen's biggest tournament yet.

body:
(APP006)
Hey guys, the RLC III 1v1 Tournament will be back this Friday @ 6PM AEST for Week 3! 
The RLC is an 8 week tournament that will have players battling it out 1v1 on Howling Abyss for a 15K+ RP and 100AUD prize!

If you'd like to join, head to this link!
https://battlefy.com/risen/rlc-iii-1v1-league-week-3/5d873cb688ece346487ede04/info?infoTab=details
If you'd like to find out more, head here:
https://discord.gg/mWhdpdm

replies.body: Is it of any skill level? And how will it work?
